name: QuickTime Extension Resource
summary: Learn about .QTR files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: The QTR and QTX files may be combined into a single QTX file using Apple's QuickTime Rezwack tool.

description: Resource file referenced by a QuickTime extension (.QTX file) that provides support for additional video codecs; stores the resource fork, which contains Macintosh-style resources.
